tech_news.title: Grok got crucial facts wrong about Bondi Beach shooting - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Grok, the chatbot built by Elon Musk’s xAI and popularized on his social media platform X, appears to have repeatedly spread misinformation about today’s mass shooting at Bondi Beach in Australia.
